name: Damnatio Memoriae
description:
You are a warrior of ancient Rome who awakes in a deserted, gloomy place called Damnatio Memoriae, where the forgotten souls wander eternally. A mysterious magical helmet guides you through your journey to discover your past and how to free yourself from your dispiriting fate.

Controls:

WASD        =--> to move

Space       =--> to jump

Left click  =--> to attack

Right click =--> to grapple to hooks

Q           =--> for slowmo (when unlocked)

E           =--> for shield (when unlocked)

R           =--> to restart from checkpoint

Please press Ok and Next on the subtitles to avoid bugs.
